mapper.select: SELECT f.facilId, f.facilType, f.facilName, r.resCode, r.resStart, r.resEnd, r.resWriter, r.resTel, r.resRequest, r.resState, a.resAdId, a.resDetail FROM reservation r JOIN facility f ON f.facilId=r.facilId JOIN facilApprove a ON a.resCode=r.resCode WHERE r.resState=110 AND r.resWriter=#{resWriter} AND r.resStart >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT f.facilId, f.facilType, f.facilName, r.resCode, r.resStart, r.resEnd, r.resWriter, r.resTel, r.resRequest, r.resState, a.resAdId, a.resDetail FROM reservation r JOIN facility f ON f.facilId=r.facilId JOIN facilApprove a ON a.resCode=r.resCode WHERE r.resState=120 AND r.resWriter=#{resWriter} AND r.resStart >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO facilApprove(resCode, resAdId, resDetail) VALUES (#{resCode}, #{resAdId}, #{resDetail})
